backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the dental clinic backend with types and CRUD operations for appointments, reviews, doctors, services, and user profiles, with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades existing actor state by adding a `state` field (defaulting to `#pending`) to all reviews and introducing a new empty `services` map.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features (Service Manager, Review Approver workflow, glassmorphism styling) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a `#root` div and loading the TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (home, service detail pages, admin panel sections) and wraps the app in QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and CursorContextProvider.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users to the access-denied page while showing a loading spinner during auth checks.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: A draggable before/after image comparison slider component that supports both mouse and touch interactions, revealing before/after treatment images by clipping based on slider position.
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A modal dialog form for booking dental appointments, collecting patient name, contact info, preferred date, and service type, with Internet Identity authentication and ICP canister integration.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a top-of-page alert banner when the clinic status is 'closed' or 'emergency', fetched from the backend, with appropriate styling and messaging for each state.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: A contact section displaying clinic phone, address, and hours alongside a WhatsApp chat button and an embedded Google Maps iframe showing the clinic location.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: A custom animated cursor component that smoothly follows the mouse using requestAnimationFrame and renders either a dental tooth SVG or a medical cross SVG based on the cursor context.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: A static section displaying the doctor's profile photo, credentials, bio, key stats, and specialty tags in a styled glass-card grid layout.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders decorative floating dental icon images with CSS bob animations and scroll-based parallax offsets positioned around the page edges.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer with brand info, quick links, services list, and social media icons, plus a hidden admin login modal triggered by triple-clicking the copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with desktop and mobile-responsive menu, containing links to Home, Services, Contact, and a LoginButton component.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-height hero section with a parallax background image, headline text, and a 'Book Appointment' button that opens the BookAppointmentDialog.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: A hidden admin login dialog that validates hardcoded credentials and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: Fixed top progress bar that tracks and visually displays the user's scroll position as a percentage of the page height.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of standard and premium dental services with custom animated card variants (bubble, laser, implant) and navigation to individual service pages.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: Auto-scrolling infinite carousel of patient reviews, fetching approved reviews from the backend and falling back to hardcoded testimonials if none are available.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and saves it as their profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: React context that provides and manages a global cursor icon state (default or dental) for use across components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor interactions including user profiles, clinic status, reviews, and appointments with appropriate cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Custom hook that animates text with a scramble effect when the target element scrolls into view, progressively resolving random characters to the target string.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for theming, Tailwind imports, animated mesh gradient background, and utility classes for glassmorphism and dental-themed animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Simple page component displaying an access denied message with a shield icon and a button to navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all clinic appointments with status filtering and allows admins to update individual appointment statuses via a dropdown, with toast notifications for success/failure.
Admin page providing a form to submit new patient reviews (name, text, star rating) that enter a pending state awaiting approval before going public.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Main admin dashboard that displays clinic status controls (open/closed/emergency) and navigation cards linking to all admin sub-pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page with a form to add new doctors (name and specialty) and a list displaying all currently registered doctors.
Admin page that lists pending reviews with star ratings and provides approve/reject actions to moderate reviews before they appear publicly.
Admin page for editing dental service details (name, description, featured photo with drag-and-drop upload) for a predefined list of services, syncing with backend data.
Detail page for the dental implants service, showcasing benefits, the treatment process, and a booking dialog trigger with animated layout sections.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main landing page that composes all major sections (header, hero, services, doctor profile, testimonials, contact, footer) and conditionally shows a user profile setup dialog for newly authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service, displaying benefits, a 6-step treatment process, a before/after slider comparison, and a booking dialog trigger.
Detail page for the Laser Dentistry service, showcasing benefits, a step-by-step treatment process with animated laser decorations, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for Pediatric Dentistry, featuring child-friendly benefits, a visit process list, animated bubble background decorations, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Generic service detail page that renders content for root canal, braces, whitening, or implants based on a URL parameter, showing benefits, process steps, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Detail page for the Smile Makeover service, including a benefits list, multi-step process, a before/after slider gallery of patient transformations, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist values in sessionStorage and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom color palette (royal-blue, teal, CSS-variable-based tokens), typography fonts, border radii, and custom animations for the dental clinic UI.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 7) describing the premium dental clinic website's features, architectural notes, known issues, required image assets, and a catalogue of existing implemented features.
